pages.text: Totems of Undying, while having a powerful effect, have the significant disadvantage that you always have to hold them in your hands.$(br)Using the pure powers of $(l:general/shards#moonstone)Moonstone$(/l) and using Polished Basalt as a focus you can keep its life-saving effect active, even when worn around the neck.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: One-time protection from death. After it is triggered, crumbles into dust.
